import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Col, Input, FormFeedback, } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Switch } from "react-router-dom"; const ContactComponent = () => { const [firstname, setfirstname] = useState(""); const [lastname, setlastname] = useState(""); const [telnum, settelnum] = useState(""); const [email, setemail] = useState(""); const [agree, setagree] = useState(false); const [contactType, setcontactType] = useState("Tel."); const [message, setmessage] = useState(""); function handelInputChange(event) { const target = event.target; const value = target.type === "checkbox" ? target.checked : target.value; const name = target.name; switch (name) { case "firstname": setfirstname(value); break; case "lastname": setlastname(value); break; case "telnum": settelnum(value); break; case "email": setemail(value); break; case "agree": setagree(value); break; case "contactType": setcontactType(value); break; case "message": setmessage(value); break; default: break; } } function handelSubmit(event) { console.log(event); // validate(firstname, lastname) event.preventDefault(); } const errormsg = { firstnameError: "", lastnameError: "", }; function validate(firstname, lastname) { if (firstname == "") errormsg.firstnameError = "First name : This Can not be blanked"; else if (firstname.lenght < 3) errormsg.firstnameError = "First name : Minimum length must be 3"; if (lastname == "") errormsg.lastnameError = "Last name : This Can not be blanked"; else if (lastname.lenght < 3) errormsg.lastnameError = "Last name : Minimum length must be 3"; console.log(errormsg) } return (
{msg = validate(firstname,lastname)}

); }; export default ContactComponent;
